languages.text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.
languages.original_text:
Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} крозиусом, все его союзники на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, наносимого той же цели.
Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью крозиуса, все его союзники совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против той же цели.

traits.locale_text:
On a successful hit with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to damage against the target for 1 round.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an attack of opportunity against the target.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

languages.text:
Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} крозиусом, все его союзники на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получают +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, наносимого той же цели.
Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью крозиуса, все его союзники совершают {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g} против той же цели.
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж совершает попадание крозиусом, все его союзники на 1 раунд получают +5 к урону, наносимого той же цели.
Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью крозиуса, все его союзники совершают атаку по возможности против той же цели.

Когда персонаж совершает попадание крозиусом, все его союзники на 1 раунд получают +5 к урону, наносимого той же цели.
Когда персонаж наносит урон с помощью крозиуса, все его союзники совершают атаку по возможности против той же цели.

languages.text:
使用这把权杖{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人之后，装备者所有盟友攻击该敌人时，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高5点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
当装备者使用此法杖造成伤害后，装备者所有盟友都会对目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
使用这把权杖{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，装备者所有盟友攻击该敌人时，造成的所有伤害提高5点，持续一{/g}轮{g|Encyclopedia:Round}。
当装备者使用此魔杖造成伤害后，装备者所有盟友都会对目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
このクロジウスが{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、使い手の味方すべてのターゲットへの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が5増加する。
使い手がこのクロジウスでダメージを与えた後、使い手の味方はそれぞれ、ターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
このクロジウスが{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間使い手の味方すべてのターゲットへのダメージ+5
自身がダメージを与えた後、味方はそれぞれターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。

languages.text:
Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} con este crozius, todos los aliados del portador causan +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra el objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
Si el portador causa daño con este crozius, cada uno de sus aliados realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el mismo objetivo.
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
Al acertar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} con este crozius, todos los aliados del portador causan +5 de daño contra el objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.
Si el portador causa daño con este crozius, cada uno de sus aliados realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra el mismo objetivo.

languages.text:
Bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Crozius, erhalten alle Verbündeten des Trägers der Waffe 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} gegen das Ziel.
Hat der Träger der Waffe mit diesem Crozius Schaden verursacht, führt jeder seiner Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel aus.
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
Bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} mit diesem Crozius, erlangen sämtliche Verbündeten des Waffenführers für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +5 Schaden gegen das Ziel.
Nachdem der Waffenführer mit diesem Crozius Schaden zugefügt hat, führt jeder seiner Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel aus.

languages.text:
Après un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} porté avec ce crozius, tous les alliés de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} contre la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts avec ce crozius, chacun de ses alliés lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre la cible.
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

traits.locale_text:
Après un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} porté à l'aide de ce crozius, tous les alliés de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +5 points de dégâts contre la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à l'aide de ce crozius, chacun de ses alliés lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre la cible.

languages.text:
Bu kroziyusla yapılan başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşta{/g} silahı kullanan kişinin tüm dost birimleri, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} hedefe karşı +5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} kazanırlar.
Kullanan kişi bu kroziyusla hasar verdiğinde dost birimlerinden her biri, hedefe birer {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.
